identity.name: Social Chess Events
identity.aesthetic: Playtomic-style Clean UI with Warm Earthy Tones

typography.instructions: Use Playfair Display for the main logo and H1 headings to give a 'Classic Chess' feel. Use Manrope for all UI elements, cards, and body text for maximum readability and a modern sports-app vibe.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium transition-all shadow-md hover:shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium

cards.event: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all border border-border/50 overflow-hidden group
cards.profile: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm p-6 border border-border/50
cards.club: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all p-0 overflow-hidden

inputs.default: bg-white border-border focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg h-12 px-4

navigation.mobile: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white border-t border-border p-4 flex justify-around items-center z-50 shadow-[0_-4px_6px_-1px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)]
navigation.desktop: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-border/40 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on the beige background if possible to give it a 'paper' feel.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the 'mahogany' and 'beige' color palettes to tailwind.config.js. Set 'background' to beige-100 (#F5F5F0) and 'primary' to mahogany-800 (#5A2A2A).
2. FONT SETUP: Import 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css. Apply Playfair to headings and Manrope to body.
3. UI STYLE: Implement the 'Playtomic' card style: White cards with rounded-2xl, soft shadow-sm, and generous padding. Do NOT use heavy borders.
4. NAVIGATION: Create a mobile-first bottom navigation bar for the main app views (Events, My Events, Profile).
5. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for seed data and UI placeholders. Do not use placeholders like 'via.placeholder.com'.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards) has a unique data-testid attribute.
7. CLUB PROFILES: Design club profiles to look like 'Communities' - show member count, upcoming events, and a 'Join Club' button.
8. EVENT CARDS: Must show: Date (Day/Month box), Title, Location, Level (Badge), and 'Seats Left' indicator.
9. AUTH: Design a clean login page with the Mahogany branding. Use a split layout (Image on left, Form on right) for desktop.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
